modules/javafx.media/src/main/native/gstreamer/3rd_party/glib/glib/grand.h

Print this page 
31 
32 #include <glib/gtypes.h>
33 
34 G_BEGIN_DECLS
35 
36 typedef struct _GRand           GRand;
37 
38 /* GRand - a good and fast random number generator: Mersenne Twister
39  * see http://www.math.sci.hiroshima-u.ac.jp/~m-mat/MT/emt.html for more info.
40  * The range functions return a value in the intervall [begin, end).
41  * int          -> [0..2^32-1]
42  * int_range    -> [begin..end-1]
43  * double       -> [0..1)
44  * double_range -> [begin..end)
45  */
46 
47 GLIB_AVAILABLE_IN_ALL
48 GRand*  g_rand_new_with_seed  (guint32  seed);
49 GLIB_AVAILABLE_IN_ALL
50 GRand*  g_rand_new_with_seed_array (const guint32 *seed,
51                     guint seed_length);
52 GLIB_AVAILABLE_IN_ALL
53 GRand*  g_rand_new            (void);
54 GLIB_AVAILABLE_IN_ALL
55 void    g_rand_free           (GRand   *rand_);
56 GLIB_AVAILABLE_IN_ALL
57 GRand*  g_rand_copy           (GRand   *rand_);
58 GLIB_AVAILABLE_IN_ALL
59 void    g_rand_set_seed       (GRand   *rand_,
60                    guint32  seed);
61 GLIB_AVAILABLE_IN_ALL
62 void    g_rand_set_seed_array (GRand   *rand_,
63                                const guint32 *seed,
64                                guint    seed_length);
65 
66 #define g_rand_boolean(rand_) ((g_rand_int (rand_) & (1 << 15)) != 0)
67 
68 GLIB_AVAILABLE_IN_ALL
69 guint32 g_rand_int            (GRand   *rand_);
70 GLIB_AVAILABLE_IN_ALL
71 gint32  g_rand_int_range      (GRand   *rand_,
72                    gint32   begin,
73                    gint32   end);
74 GLIB_AVAILABLE_IN_ALL
75 gdouble g_rand_double         (GRand   *rand_);
76 GLIB_AVAILABLE_IN_ALL
77 gdouble g_rand_double_range   (GRand   *rand_,
78                    gdouble  begin,
79                    gdouble  end);
80 GLIB_AVAILABLE_IN_ALL
81 void    g_random_set_seed     (guint32  seed);
82 
83 #define g_random_boolean() ((g_random_int () & (1 << 15)) != 0)
84 
85 GLIB_AVAILABLE_IN_ALL
86 guint32 g_random_int          (void);
87 GLIB_AVAILABLE_IN_ALL
88 gint32  g_random_int_range    (gint32   begin,
89                    gint32   end);
90 GLIB_AVAILABLE_IN_ALL
91 gdouble g_random_double       (void);
92 GLIB_AVAILABLE_IN_ALL
93 gdouble g_random_double_range (gdouble  begin,
94                    gdouble  end);
95 
96 
97 G_END_DECLS
98 
99 #endif /* __G_RAND_H__ */

31 
32 #include <glib/gtypes.h>
33 
34 G_BEGIN_DECLS
35 
36 typedef struct _GRand           GRand;
37 
38 /* GRand - a good and fast random number generator: Mersenne Twister
39  * see http://www.math.sci.hiroshima-u.ac.jp/~m-mat/MT/emt.html for more info.
40  * The range functions return a value in the intervall [begin, end).
41  * int          -> [0..2^32-1]
42  * int_range    -> [begin..end-1]
43  * double       -> [0..1)
44  * double_range -> [begin..end)
45  */
46 
47 GLIB_AVAILABLE_IN_ALL
48 GRand*  g_rand_new_with_seed  (guint32  seed);
49 GLIB_AVAILABLE_IN_ALL
50 GRand*  g_rand_new_with_seed_array (const guint32 *seed,
51             guint seed_length);
52 GLIB_AVAILABLE_IN_ALL
53 GRand*  g_rand_new            (void);
54 GLIB_AVAILABLE_IN_ALL
55 void    g_rand_free           (GRand   *rand_);
56 GLIB_AVAILABLE_IN_ALL
57 GRand*  g_rand_copy           (GRand   *rand_);
58 GLIB_AVAILABLE_IN_ALL
59 void    g_rand_set_seed       (GRand   *rand_,
60              guint32  seed);
61 GLIB_AVAILABLE_IN_ALL
62 void  g_rand_set_seed_array (GRand   *rand_,
63              const guint32 *seed,
64              guint    seed_length);
65 
66 #define g_rand_boolean(rand_) ((g_rand_int (rand_) & (1 << 15)) != 0)
67 
68 GLIB_AVAILABLE_IN_ALL
69 guint32 g_rand_int            (GRand   *rand_);
70 GLIB_AVAILABLE_IN_ALL
71 gint32  g_rand_int_range      (GRand   *rand_,
72              gint32   begin,
73              gint32   end);
74 GLIB_AVAILABLE_IN_ALL

78              gdouble  begin,
79              gdouble  end);
80 GLIB_AVAILABLE_IN_ALL

84

94              gdouble  end);
